bill_title: prohibit the manufacturing, delivering, distributing, and selling of food containing specified substances.

bill_versions.bill_text: An Act to prohibit the manufacturing, delivering, distributing, and selling of food containing specified substances. Be it enacted by the Legislature of the State of South Dakota: Section 1. That chapter 39-4 be amended with a NEW SECTION: Beginning July 1, 2025, it is a Class 1 misdemeanor for any person to manufacture, deliver, distribute, hold, offer for sale, or sell a food product for human consumption that contains: (1) Brominated vegetable oil, CAS registry number 8016-94-2; (2) Potassium bromate, CAS registry number 7758-01-2; (3) Propylparaben, CAS registry number 94-13-3; or (4) Red dye number 3, CAS registry number 16423-68-0.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
